name: deusoma
text: If it was anyone but Mr. Bear, I'd think he'd just dropped a sizable amount of acid, and Ray and Beef had given him The Fear.

name: cailetshadow
text:
This is actually a pretty good look for Beef. Picture him with this hair at Smoke's next Open-Mic poetry night.

ohhhh shiiiiiiit

name: rowboat
text: I love the reaction of Cornelius' ears in the third panel. That's basically my favorite thing for a cartoon animal's ears to do. Reminds me of Arthur when he realized what kind of cat Nice Pete was.

name: lost_buoy
text: That little stunt totally bogarted the CC. Spice Channel subscribers are all up in arms.

text: What was he focusing on? Crucial plot details are missing.

text: The woman's china doll collection, prominently displayed near a window so as to be visible from where the car was parked.

text: They were totally first going to disappear all gradually.
